Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • Server

  • public class Server
extends java.lang.Thread
    Central class in the server representation. The server object is implemented as a thread.
    Author:
    Marcelina

      void run​()
      defines the behavior of the server - it will wait for clients to connect, as soon as one of them does a connectionHandler is created for them and the communication between this client and server is handled in that connectionHandler

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run​()
        defines the behavior of the server - it will wait for clients to connect, as soon as one of them does a connectionHandler is created for them and the communication between this client and server is handled in that connectionHandler
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread

        returns the server window object belonging to this server

      • removeConnectionHandler

        public void removeConnectionHandler​(ClientConnectionHandler clientConnectionHandler)
        used to remove a given connection handler from the connectionHandler arraylist. Game is disrupted.
        Parameters:
        clientConnectionHandler - clientConnectionHandler of the client who disconnected

        public final void informConnectionLost​(int playerId)
        Informs the clients that a client has disconnected => terminate game
        Parameters:
        l -

      • clearMemory

        public final void clearMemory​()
        Use with caution! Resets the entire memory (Useful if a game ends or terminates).

      • deactivateServer

        public void deactivateServer​()
        Deactivates the server

      • broadcast

        public void broadcast​(java.lang.Object object)
        Broadcast and object to all clients via connection handler.

      • broadcastToAllOthers

        public void broadcastToAllOthers​(int playerID,
                                 java.lang.Object object)
        Broadcasts and object to all clients except playerID via connection handler.
        Parameters:
        playerID - The player, who should not receive this object.
        object - The object to send to all clients.

      • sendObjectTo

        public void sendObjectTo​(int playerID,
                         java.lang.Object object)
        Sends an object to one client.
        Parameters:
        playerID - The ID of the client you want to send the object to.
        object - The object to send one client.
